price: Kuma Ya bã ku dukkan abin da kuka rõƙe Shi kuma idan kun ƙidaya, ni'imar Allah bã zã ku lissafe ta ba. Lalle ne mutum, haƙĩƙa, mai yawan zãlunci ne, mai yawan kãfirci.
arabic: وَءَاتَىٰكُم مِّن كُلِّ مَا سَأَلۡتُمُوهُۚ وَإِن تَعُدُّواْ نِعۡمَتَ ٱللَّهِ لَا تُحۡصُوهَآۗ إِنَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ لَظَلُومٞ كَفَّارٞ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waātākum min kulli mā sa-altumūhu wa-in taʿuddū niʿ'mata al-lahi lā tuḥ'ṣūhā inna al-insāna laẓalūmun kaffārun
translations: you will (be able to) count them
